original_title: VeggieTales: If I Sang a Silly Song
overview: Larry hosts the biggest, the silliest, most excellent countdown of Silly Songs in the history of Silliness! Find out the #1 songs from first and second decades of VeggieTales Silly Songs, voted on by you - the fans!! PLUS witness the debut of an all-new, sure-to-be-favorite Silly Song picked from thousands of fan submitted entries!
title: VeggieTales: If I Sang a Silly Song
